TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServerChannelSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供用于安全和传输接收器的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used for security and transport sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信道接收器提供了一个插件点，该插件点允许访问流过通道的基础消息，以及用于将消息发送到远程对象的传输机制所使用的流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 信道接收器在通道接收器提供程序链中链接在一起，并且在序列化并传输消息之前，所有通道消息都流过此接收器链。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 接口的实现。The following code example illustrates an implementation of the interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/serversink.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/serversink.cs#60)] 有关相应的服务器接收器提供程序实现的示例，请参阅 接口文档。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding server sink provider implementation.

span.span: Requests processing from the current sink of the response from a method call sent asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state` 参数包含推送到信道接收器堆栈并与当前接收器关联的信息。The `state` parameter contains information that was pushed onto the channel sink stack and associated with the current sink. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CPP/commontransportkeys.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CS/commontransportkeys.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/VB/commontransportkeys.vb#1)]

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

summary.span: 请求从当前接收器处理消息。

span.span: Requests message processing from the current sink.

returns.span: 一个 状态值，该值提供有关如何处理消息的信息。

span.span: A status value that provides information about how message was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代理的工作是将调用的方法调用转换为消息对象。The job of a proxy is to convert a method call invoked on it into a message object. 此消息对象（实现 接口）通过在消息接收器对象上调用 从客户端传递到服务器端。This message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 消息接收器链接在一起，因为每个消息接收器都在执行其工作后负责调用下一个消息接收器上的 。Message sinks are chained together in the sense that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 例如，与同步相关的消息接收器可以导致获取或释放锁，然后将其进一步委托给下游消息接收器。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink can cause a lock to be acquired or released, and then delegated further to the downstream message sink.

exception.span: 直接调用方没有基础结构权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
